## quatToAxisAngle variable

Decomposes quaternion into `[axis, theta]` tuple.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
quatToAxisAngle: (quat: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>) => (number | number[])[]
```
